job.title: Seeking Senior Web Developer/Software Engineer for Remote FTE role
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, PROTECH, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<br><br>Great opportunity to work for a fast growing global tech player an excellent compensation and benefits package. Ideal candidate experience 5+ years of professional experience with JavaScript (ES5 and up) 4+ years of experience using popular front-end librariesframeworks (React or Angular 2+, Webpack) Experience calling RESTFUL APIs. Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and cross-browser compatibility issues. Experience with testing tools is a plus (Any unit testing tool like Jest or Jasmine). English Fluency is required. The ability to work on your own without a lot of help or supervision. Good work ethic, with a strong sense of responsibility. Problem-solving skills. Web design experience. SASSLESS preprocessors knowledge.
